titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for more effective use of the deduction for domestic production activities for businesses with net operating losses.
American Competitiveness Tax Act of 2007
American Competitiveness Tax Act of 2007

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: American Competitiveness Tax Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow business taxpayers with net operating losses in prior taxable years to claim a full tax deduction for income attributable to domestic production activities.
